source: TEXT_JOBSCH650_02925_SEQ_00<tab>Alka Zolka fusses over Setoto.
target: TEXT_JOBSCH650_02925_SEQ_00<tab>Alka Zolka regarde Setoto avec un sourire jusqu'aux oreilles.

source: TEXT_JOBSCH650_02925_SEQ_01<tab>As Setoto appears to be fully recovered, Alka Zolka would like to begin the search for a memento of her father. The Royal Marine suggests beginning at Amdapor Keep. If, as you have come to suspect, Setoto's father was captured by the Amdapori while on a mission to discover a way to reverse the Nymian plague, he would have been transported to Amdapor Keep for questioning. It is then likely that some of his remaining possessions can be found there. Make your way to the ancient ruins and look for any items which Setoto might remember her father by.
target: TEXT_JOBSCH650_02925_SEQ_01<tab>Setoto s'est remise de ses blessures, à la plus grande joie d'Alka Zolka. Le maraudeur intellectuel a fait une dé<var 16 /var>mon<var 16 /var>stra<var 16 /var>tion de ses talents de déduction et a préconisé de commencer les recherches dans le Château d'Amdapor, là où il y a le plus de probabilités que des prisonniers importants aient pu être emprisonnés. Rejoignez vos deux compagnons devant l'entrée du Château d'Amdapor dans la Forêt du sud.

source: TEXT_JOBSCH650_02925_SEQ_02<tab>The three of you pick your way through Amdapor Keep, and you encounter various denizens of the ruins and ancient artifacts─including an Amdapori journal which touches upon taking a Nymian spy captive. From it you are able to conclude that Setoto's father's personal effects have been stored in a mana idol. As you begin dismantling these Amdapori golems, you are confronted by a manasnatcher, one of the hulking creatures that resides there. After a hard-fought battle, it falls lifeless to the ground, and a coffer tumbles from its innards. You, Alka, and Setoto move to open it.
target: TEXT_JOBSCH650_02925_SEQ_02<tab>Après de longues recherches et un démantèlement en règle d'automates, vous avez trouvé les effets que le père de Setoto s'était vu confisquer lors de sa capture.

source: TEXT_JOBSCH650_02925_SEQ_03<tab>You open it to see that it contains what appears to be Setoto's father's grimoire, clothes, and soul crystal. Gingerly taking the crystal in her hands, Setoto begs her father's faerie, Lilac, to appear. It unleashes a sphere of purple light and Setoto falls to the ground, unconscious. After an unsuccessful attempt to wake her, Alka Zolka bids you help him transport the tonberry out of the dangerous ruins and to Camp Tranquil.
target: TEXT_JOBSCH650_02925_SEQ_03<tab>Parmi ceux-ci, son cristal d'âme a attiré l'attention de la tomberry. Elle vous a révélé que la pierre contenait la fée transmise de génération en génération dans leur famille. Setoto a tenté de recevoir son héritage, mais s'est malheureusement écroulée par terre après l'échec de l'invocation. Allez vous enquérir de son état auprès d'Alka Zolka au camp des Sentes tranquilles.

source:
TEXT_JOBSCH650_02925_SEQ_04You and Alka return to Camp Tranquil with Setoto, and the marauder asks that you use your knowledge to diagnose what is wrong with her. You conclude that, despite the lack of physical injuries, it will be a while before the young tonberry girl wakes. Alka is deeply troubled by the news, and his panicked shouts draw the attention of Landenel of the Wood Wailers, who offers to take Setoto into his care until such a time she has recovered. Requesting that you remain behind with her and Landenel, Alka Zolka leaves you for Bronze Lake to speak with Surito Carito.

※The next scholar quest will be available from Alka Zolka upon reaching level 68.
target:
TEXT_JOBSCH650_02925_SEQ_04Vous avez examiné Setoto à la demande d'Alka Zolka. Bien que sa vie ne paraisse pas en danger, rien ne semble pouvoir la tirer de sa profonde léthargie. Landenel, un lieutenant des vigiles sombres pauvre en manières, mais riche en cœur, a offert le refuge d'une tente à votre amie le temps qu'elle reprenne conscience. Ne sachant comment lui venir en aide, Alka Zolka a décidé de consulter les lumières de Surito Carito et vous fera savoir ce qu'il aura appris dès que possible.
* Alka Zolka propose la prochaine quête aux érudits de niveau 68.

target: TEXT_JOBSCH650_02925_TODO_00<tab>Parler à Alka Zolka, à l'entrée du Château d'Amdapor

target: TEXT_JOBSCH650_02925_TODO_01<tab>Parler à Alka Zolka, à l'entrée du Château d'Amdapor

source: TEXT_JOBSCH650_02925_ALKAZOLKA_000_001<tab>Setoto! You appear to be doing much better. Even your complexion has returned to normal.
target: TEXT_JOBSCH650_02925_ALKAZOLKA_000_001<tab>Tu as repris des couleurs Setoto, ça fait plaisir<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_JOBSCH650_02925_SETOTO_000_002<tab>Indeed! I, too, noticed that my skin once again glows a healthy shade of green!
target: TEXT_JOBSCH650_02925_SETOTO_000_002<tab>Vous avez l'œil, Alka Zolka. Moi-même, en me regardant dans le miroir ce matin, j'ai trouvé mon teint encore plus olivâtre qu'à l'accoutumée<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_JOBSCH650_02925_ALKAZOLKA_000_003<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, now that Setoto has recovered, our search can begin. Ere we depart, let us quickly review what we know.
target: TEXT_JOBSCH650_02925_ALKAZOLKA_000_003<tab>Bon, avant de nous précipiter à Amdapor, résumons ce que nous savons.

source: TEXT_JOBSCH650_02925_ALKAZOLKA_000_004<tab>Setoto's father was a scholar in the Royal Marines who had been dispatched on a mission to infiltrate Amdapor. He was to return with a cure to the disease that threatened to engulf Nym─only, he never did.
target: TEXT_JOBSCH650_02925_ALKAZOLKA_000_004<tab>Le père de Setoto était un érudit militaire qui faisait partie des marins-soldats de Nym. Il devait s'infiltrer dans la cité d'Amdapor dans le plus grand secret, mais ne revint jamais de sa mission.

source: TEXT_JOBSCH650_02925_SETOTO_000_005<tab>Yes. I am almost certain he was caught, captured, and then killed by the Amdapori...
target: TEXT_JOBSCH650_02925_SETOTO_000_005<tab>Oui... Il aura été démasqué par les gardes de la cité et fait prisonnier, ou exécuté...

source: TEXT_JOBSCH650_02925_SETOTO_000_006<tab>Even if that was not the case, after fifteen hundred years, we can safely assume he is no longer alive. I hold out hope, however, that some of his belongings remain.
target: TEXT_JOBSCH650_02925_SETOTO_000_006<tab>De toute façon, après tout ce temps je n'entretenais plus l'espoir de le retrouver un jour en vie. Mais... si je pouvais au moins trouver quelque chose qui lui appartenait pour conserver son souvenir, cela me ferait ex<var 16 /var>trê<var 16 /var>me<var 16 /var>ment plaisir.

source: TEXT_JOBSCH650_02925_ALKAZOLKA_000_007<tab>The Amdapori were extremely dedicated to expanding their knowledge of healing magic. Anything in a scholar's possession would have been of incredible value to them, and had your father been captured, they would have confiscated all that he had.
target: TEXT_JOBSCH650_02925_ALKAZOLKA_000_007<tab>Concrètement, nous avons de grandes chances de retrouver les effets du père de Setoto. Ces mages étaient par<var 16 /var>ti<var 16 /var>cu<var 16 /var>liè<var 16 /var>rement intéressés par la magie curative et se seraient jetés sur la moindre occasion d'étudier un objet s'y rapportant. Ils les auront donc conservés en lieu sûr.

source: TEXT_JOBSCH650_02925_ALKAZOLKA_000_008<tab>He would then likely have been transported to a remote and secure location for interrogation. That means...
target: TEXT_JOBSCH650_02925_ALKAZOLKA_000_008<tab>Qui plus est, les Nymiens étaient leurs ennemis jurés. S'ils avaient capturé l'un de leurs soldats, ils l'auraient soumis à la question. Et afin de ne laisser aucune échappatoire à cette précieuse source d'in<var 16 /var>for<var 16 /var>ma<var 16 /var>tions, ils l'auraient emprisonné dans une forteresse inexpugnable. Autrement dit...

source: TEXT_JOBSCH650_02925_ALKAZOLKA_000_009<tab>Our chances of finding anything that once belonged to him will be highest in Amdapor Keep.
target: TEXT_JOBSCH650_02925_ALKAZOLKA_000_009<tab>Au Château d'Amdapor<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_JOBSCH650_02925_SETOTO_000_010<tab>Oh, Alka, not only are you terribly kind, but you are keen of mind, as well!
target: TEXT_JOBSCH650_02925_SETOTO_000_010<tab>Incroyable<var 1D /var>! Votre pouvoir de déduction est à la hauteur de votre gentillesse, Alka Zolka<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_JOBSCH650_02925_ALKAZOLKA_000_011<tab>Ahem. Thank you. Now, in the final years of the War of the Magi, Amdapor was demolished by the Mhachi. It was overrun with a myriad of voidsent beasts that linger to this day.
target: TEXT_JOBSCH650_02925_ALKAZOLKA_000_011<tab>Nous devrons faire preuve de la plus grande prudence. Les ruines que nous nous apprêtons à explorer sont le résultat des forces destructrices que Mhach a déchaînées sur Amdapor au crépuscule de la Guerre de la magie. Des myriades de démons rôdent encore entre ses murs.

source: TEXT_JOBSCH650_02925_ALKAZOLKA_000_012<tab>As we forge forward, you must be sure to keep your wits about you! Amdapor Keep is fraught with dangers both known and unknown.
target: TEXT_JOBSCH650_02925_ALKAZOLKA_000_012<tab>Alors, faites attention où vous mettez les pieds<var 1D /var>! En route pour le Château d'Amdapor<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_JOBSCH650_02925_SETOTO_000_015<tab>For so long I've been treated like a hideous beast that I'd forgotten what it was like to be thought of as a girl. Alka has reminded me, and for that, I cannot thank him enough.
target: TEXT_JOBSCH650_02925_SETOTO_000_015<tab>Depuis le temps, ça ne me fait plus ni chaud ni froid de voir les gens hurler de peur en me voyant. Alors rencontrer quelqu'un qui me traite vraiment comme une fille, c'est... hé hé...

source: TEXT_JOBSCH650_02925_ALKAZOLKA_100_020<tab>We've finally made it! <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, if you're ready, please lead the way.
target: TEXT_JOBSCH650_02925_ALKAZOLKA_100_020<tab>Salut, partenaire<var 1D /var>! On t'attendait. Maintenant que tu es là, on va pouvoir entrer. On ne repartira pas sans avoir trouvé un souvenir du père de Setoto<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_JOBSCH650_02925_SETOTO_000_020<tab>So this is Amdapor Keep...erstwhile home to the mages we fought so long and hard against.
target: TEXT_JOBSCH650_02925_SETOTO_000_020<tab>C'est donc ça, le château de l'ancienne cité d'Amdapor... La source de tous nos maux...

source: TEXT_JOBSCH650_02925_QIB_001_TODO_1<tab>Find Setoto a memento of her father!
target: TEXT_JOBSCH650_02925_QIB_001_TODO_1<tab>Trouvez un souvenir du père de Setoto<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_JOBSCH650_02925_QIB_001_TODO_2<tab>Defeat the manasnatcher!
target: TEXT_JOBSCH650_02925_QIB_001_TODO_2<tab>Éliminez le pillard de mana<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_JOBSCH650_02925_QIB_001_ALKAZOLKA_10<tab>The Presence Chamber... From here we must tread with caution. We know not what dangers lurk in the shadows.
target: TEXT_JOBSCH650_02925_QIB_001_ALKAZOLKA_10<tab>Alors c'est donc ça le Château d'Amdapor<var 1D /var>? <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, Setoto, faites attention aux démons, d'accord<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_JOBSCH650_02925_QIB_001_SETOTO_10<tab>Whatever happens, I shall not leave this place without something to remember my father by.
target: TEXT_JOBSCH650_02925_QIB_001_SETOTO_10<tab>Je trouverai un souvenir de mon père, quoi qu'il m'en coûte<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_JOBSCH650_02925_QIB_001_SETOTO_01<tab><gasp> <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! This log─I think it's about my late father...
target: TEXT_JOBSCH650_02925_QIB_001_SETOTO_01<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var><var 1D /var>! Le nom de mon père doit forcément être consigné dans ce registre des prisonniers<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_JOBSCH650_02925_QIB_001_SYSTEM_02<tab>(-Tattered Log-)The interrogation of the Nymian spy we apprehended is scheduled to soon take place at the Moot Hall.
target: TEXT_JOBSCH650_02925_QIB_001_SYSTEM_02<tab>(-Registre des prisonniers-)L'interrogatoire des espions nymiens capturés un peu plus tôt dans la semaine a été prévu pour aujourd'hui et aura lieu dans le Hall de l'Amertume.

source: TEXT_JOBSCH650_02925_QIB_001_SYSTEM_03<tab>(-Tattered Log-)The healing powers his people wield are not like to those of white magic. Regardless of what it takes, we must find a way to determine the mysterious source of his power.
target: TEXT_JOBSCH650_02925_QIB_001_SYSTEM_03<tab>(-Registre des prisonniers-)Nous devons tout mettre en œuvre pour nous approprier les secrets de leur magie curative, si éloignée de la magie blanche.

source: TEXT_JOBSCH650_02925_QIB_001_SYSTEM_04<tab>(-Tattered Log-)We suspect his robes are crucial to his spellcasting. They will no doubt hold some of the answers.
target: TEXT_JOBSCH650_02925_QIB_001_SYSTEM_04<tab>(-Registre des prisonniers-)À n'en pas douter, les objets qu'ils portaient sur eux au moment de leur capture seront d'une grande utilité, voire nécessaires, pour percer le secret des érudits de Nym.

source: TEXT_JOBSCH650_02925_QIB_001_SYSTEM_05<tab>(-Tattered Log-)For now, however, we will be sealing them away in one of our mana idols.
target: TEXT_JOBSCH650_02925_QIB_001_SYSTEM_05<tab>(-Registre des prisonniers-)À cette fin, ils ont été confisqués et entreposés à l'abri dans un automate de type “Idole”.

source: TEXT_JOBSCH650_02925_QIB_001_ALKAZOLKA_05<tab>Then we must begin dismantling the mana idols!
target: TEXT_JOBSCH650_02925_QIB_001_ALKAZOLKA_05<tab>Un automate de type “Idole”, hein<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_JOBSCH650_02925_QIB_101_ALKAZOLKA_05<tab>One of them might be carrying Setoto's father's things!
target: TEXT_JOBSCH650_02925_QIB_101_ALKAZOLKA_05<tab>On a qu'à déboulonner tous ceux qu'on croisera sur notre chemin et on finira bien par tomber dessus<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_JOBSCH650_02925_QIB_001_SETOTO_11<tab>Rubbish, nothing more...
target: TEXT_JOBSCH650_02925_QIB_001_SETOTO_11<tab>Je ne vois que des objets sans valeur dans cette caisse...

source: TEXT_JOBSCH650_02925_QIB_001_ALKAZOLKA_06<tab>All the pages are in tatters. Perhaps we'll have better luck with the next one we find.
target: TEXT_JOBSCH650_02925_QIB_001_ALKAZOLKA_06<tab>Dommage, les pages de ce livre sont en lambeaux. On aura peut-être plus de chance avec le prochain<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_JOBSCH650_02925_QIB_001_SETOTO_07<tab>Nothing in this bag looks as though it could have belonged to him...
target: TEXT_JOBSCH650_02925_QIB_001_SETOTO_07<tab>Rien de tout ça n'appartenait à mon père...

source: TEXT_JOBSCH650_02925_QIB_001_ALKAZOLKA_11<tab><cough> <cough> The stench... It's worse than that of spoilt milk!
target: TEXT_JOBSCH650_02925_QIB_001_ALKAZOLKA_11<tab>Par les Douze<var 1D /var>! C-c'est du lait caillé<var 1D /var>! Quelle puanteur<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_JOBSCH650_02925_QIB_001_ALKAZOLKA_08<tab>This book appears to─
target: TEXT_JOBSCH650_02925_QIB_001_ALKAZOLKA_08<tab>Hmm... Ils ne parlent pas de ton père dans ce carnet, Setoto.

source: TEXT_JOBSCH650_02925_QIB_001_ALKAZOLKA_17<tab><grunt> Wh-What's this? My body tingles from head to toe and suddenly I feel so light! It must be charmed!
target: TEXT_JOBSCH650_02925_QIB_001_ALKAZOLKA_17<tab>Waouh<var 1D /var>! Je me sens léger comme l'air<var 1D /var>! Ce livre renfermait encore quelques pouvoirs magiques<var 1D /var>!?

source: TEXT_JOBSCH650_02925_QIB_001_ALKAZOLKA_16<tab>This chest is full to the brim with treasure!
target: TEXT_JOBSCH650_02925_QIB_001_ALKAZOLKA_16<tab>Oh<var 1D /var>! Regardez comme ça brille<var 1D /var>! Ça doit valoir son pesant d'or<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_JOBSCH650_02925_QIB_001_SETOTO_12<tab>No. This isn't what we're looking for. Let us leave it.
target: TEXT_JOBSCH650_02925_QIB_001_SETOTO_12<tab>Mon père ne se serait pas encombré de la sorte. Laissons-les ici.

source: TEXT_JOBSCH650_02925_QIB_001_ALKAZOLKA_12<tab>Why are there so many broken mana─ Great gods! That beast! Over there!
target: TEXT_JOBSCH650_02925_QIB_001_ALKAZOLKA_12<tab>Oh oh... Ces automates ont connu des jours meilleurs. On doit ça à l'affreux derrière eux<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_JOBSCH650_02925_QIB_001_ALKAZOLKA_13<tab>He's spotted us! We have no choice but to fight him.
target: TEXT_JOBSCH650_02925_QIB_001_ALKAZOLKA_13<tab>Quelle plaie<var 1D /var>! On ne va pas pouvoir examiner les automates tran<var 16 /var>quil<var 16 /var>le<var 16 /var>ment<var 1D /var>! Viens, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. On va lui apprendre les bonnes manières<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_JOBSCH650_02925_QIB_001_ALKAZOLKA_14<tab>Is...is that a coffer!? This thing must have been feeding on the mana idols!
target: TEXT_JOBSCH650_02925_QIB_001_ALKAZOLKA_14<tab>Un coffre<var 1D /var>!? Ah<var 1D /var>! Il a dû l'avaler tout rond alors qu'il dévorait les automates<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_JOBSCH650_02925_QIB_001_ALKAZOLKA_15<tab>Setoto, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! Perhaps this is it...
target: TEXT_JOBSCH650_02925_QIB_001_ALKAZOLKA_15<tab>Alors<var 1D /var>!? Alors<var 1D /var>!? C'est la bonne cette fois-ci<var 1D /var>!?

source: TEXT_JOBSCH650_02925_QIB_001_ALKAZOLKA_DEAD<tab>Seven hells! We're done for...
target: TEXT_JOBSCH650_02925_QIB_001_ALKAZOLKA_DEAD<tab>La science et l'acier... n'ont pas suffi...

source: TEXT_JOBSCH650_02925_QIB_001_SETOTO_DEAD<tab>Father...forgive me...
target: TEXT_JOBSCH650_02925_QIB_001_SETOTO_DEAD<tab>Ah... Pa-Papa...

source: TEXT_JOBSCH650_02925_QIB_001_SETOTO_09<tab>
target: TEXT_JOBSCH650_02925_QIB_001_SETOTO_09<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_JOBSCH650_02925_NCUT_ALKAZOLKA_000_000<tab>Look! It's a Nymian grimoire!
target: TEXT_JOBSCH650_02925_NCUT_ALKAZOLKA_000_000<tab>Oh, regardez<var 1D /var>! Un codex d'érudit militaire nymien<var 1D /var>! On aurait touché le gros lot<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_JOBSCH650_02925_NCUT_SETOTO_000_001<tab>I recognize this! It's my father's! And these...
target: TEXT_JOBSCH650_02925_NCUT_SETOTO_000_001<tab>Aucun doute possible<var 1D /var>! C'est le codex de mon père, je le reconnaîtrais entre mille<var 1D /var>! Le reste du contenu du coffre doit lui appartenir aussi alors<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_JOBSCH650_02925_NCUT_SETOTO_000_002<tab>These are his robes! Th-They're from the day he left. All of it has been so perfectly preserved, it's almost as though he were wearing them but yesterday...
target: TEXT_JOBSCH650_02925_NCUT_SETOTO_000_002<tab>Ah ah<var 1D /var>! Il y a même ses vêtements<var 1D /var>! Je n'arrive pas à croire qu'ils soient encore en si bon état après tout ce temps.

source: TEXT_JOBSCH650_02925_NCUT_SETOTO_000_003<tab>Oh? What's this?
target: TEXT_JOBSCH650_02925_NCUT_SETOTO_000_003<tab>Et ça... Je le reconnais...

source: TEXT_JOBSCH650_02925_NCUT_ALKAZOLKA_000_004<tab>...Is that his <var 1A 02 /var>soul crystal<var 1A 01 /var>!?
target: TEXT_JOBSCH650_02925_NCUT_ALKAZOLKA_000_004<tab>C'est le cristal d'âme de ton père, Setoto<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_JOBSCH650_02925_NCUT_SETOTO_000_005<tab>Yes...and within slumbers the faerie that has been with my family for generations.
target: TEXT_JOBSCH650_02925_NCUT_SETOTO_000_005<tab>Oui... Il se transmet dans ma famille depuis des générations. Une fée sommeille à l'intérieur.

source: TEXT_JOBSCH650_02925_NCUT_SETOTO_000_006<tab>I thought I had lost nearly everyone to that godsforsaken war and the terrible disease that followed... Yet, in spite of all odds, here she is─the last of my family, sitting right in the palm of my hand. I would give anything to see her again.
target: TEXT_JOBSCH650_02925_NCUT_SETOTO_000_006<tab>Elle compte beaucoup pour moi. J'ai tant perdu durant la Guerre de la magie, et la lèpre du tomberry m'a dérobé du peu qu'il me restait. C'est la seule famille qu'il me reste. J'ai tellement envie de la revoir au moins une fois.

source: TEXT_JOBSCH650_02925_NCUT_SETOTO_000_007<tab>Lilac...? Lilac, please... Answer me!
target: TEXT_JOBSCH650_02925_NCUT_SETOTO_000_007<tab>Je t'en prie<var 1D /var>! Lilas<var 1D /var>! Réponds à mon appel<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_JOBSCH650_02925_NCUT_ALKAZOLKA_000_008<tab>Setoto? <var 1A 02 /var>Setoto<var 1A 01 /var>!? What happened? Wake up!
target: TEXT_JOBSCH650_02925_NCUT_ALKAZOLKA_000_008<tab>S-Setoto<var 1D /var>!? Qu'est-ce qu'il t'arrive<var 1D /var>!? Setoto<var 1D /var>!? Setoto<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_JOBSCH650_02925_NCUT_ALKAZOLKA_000_009<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, something's wrong! She's not responding. We must get her back to Camp Tranquil immediately!
target: TEXT_JOBSCH650_02925_NCUT_ALKAZOLKA_000_009<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var><var 1D /var>! Aide-moi<var 1D /var>! On va déjà la ramener au camp des Sentes tranquilles<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_JOBSCH650_02925_ALKAZOLKA_000_050<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, you're a Royal Marine and an outstanding scholar, besides. Surely, you can diagnose what's wrong with her?
target: TEXT_JOBSCH650_02925_ALKAZOLKA_000_050<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, tu es <var 08 E905 ((la seule érudite)) ((le seul érudit)) /var> militaire que comptent les marins-soldats de la 7e ère astrale<var 1D /var>! Tu es mon seul espoir<var 1D /var>! Dis-moi ce qui ne va pas chez elle<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_JOBSCH650_02925_SYSTEM_000_051<tab>Setoto has no external injuries, and both her breathing and pulse are stable. Despite this, she appears to have slipped into a coma from which she will not wake any time soon.
target: TEXT_JOBSCH650_02925_SYSTEM_000_051<tab>Setoto n'est pas blessée et respire normalement. Elle semble cependant être plongée dans une inquiétante léthargie.

source: TEXT_JOBSCH650_02925_ALKAZOLKA_000_052<tab>She won't be waking any time soon!? No, that can't be! What in the seven hells happened back there!?
target: TEXT_JOBSCH650_02925_ALKAZOLKA_000_052<tab>Impossible de la réveiller<var 1D /var>!? Par tous les diables<var 1D /var>! Que lui est-il arrivé<var 1D /var>!?

source: TEXT_JOBSCH650_02925_LANDENEL_000_053<tab>Troubled civilians in need of a helping hand, I presume? Might the Wood Wailers be of assistance?
target: TEXT_JOBSCH650_02925_LANDENEL_000_053<tab>Excusez-moi, je vous entends crier depuis tout à l'heure. Vous avez un ennui<var 1D /var>? Les vigiles sombres peuvent peut-être vous aid...

source: TEXT_JOBSCH650_02925_LANDENEL_000_054<tab>Ah! Well, if it isn't the adventurer! What brings you to this neck of the woods?
target: TEXT_JOBSCH650_02925_LANDENEL_000_054<tab>Hé, mais c'est <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var><var 1D /var>! Ça faisait un bail<var 1D /var>! Pourquoi ramener vos fesses maintenant<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_JOBSCH650_02925_ALKAZOLKA_000_055<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, this is another one of your friends, I take it?
target: TEXT_JOBSCH650_02925_ALKAZOLKA_000_055<tab>T-tu connais ce gougnafier, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>...<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_JOBSCH650_02925_LANDENEL_000_056<tab>So, in essence, a botched invocation rendered this thing unconscious? The solution to that is simple enough. Just leave it there to rest until it wakes up.
target: TEXT_JOBSCH650_02925_LANDENEL_000_056<tab>Si je résume, chapeau pointu a essayé d'appeler une fée et s'est affalé par terre juste après<var 1D /var>? Eh bien, laissez-le donc dormir à la fraîche, votre copain. Ça lui fera du bien.

source: TEXT_JOBSCH650_02925_ALKAZOLKA_000_057<tab>Thing!? <var 1A 02 /var>Thing<var 1A 01 /var>!? How dare you speak of Setoto in such a callous manner! And to think that you would suggest we leave this beautiful young lady out <var 1A 02 /var>here<var 1A 01 /var> in the open until she wakes up─you must be mad!
target: TEXT_JOBSCH650_02925_ALKAZOLKA_000_057<tab>Comment<var 1D /var>!? Vous oseriez laisser ici cette demoiselle, sans toit sous lequel s'abriter<var 1D /var>!?

source: TEXT_JOBSCH650_02925_LANDENEL_000_058<tab>Young lady...? You're quite sure that's what he─er, she is?
target: TEXT_JOBSCH650_02925_LANDENEL_000_058<tab>Une demoiselle... Ça...<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_JOBSCH650_02925_LANDENEL_000_059<tab>Ahem. My apologies. I shall carry the young girl inside and see that she is given a proper place to rest. But before that... This...coat of green mucus isn't contagious, is it?
target: TEXT_JOBSCH650_02925_LANDENEL_000_059<tab>Si vous le dites... Bon, je vais vous prêter une tente jusqu'à ce qu'elle se remette de ses émotions. Mais je ne veux pas de traces de bave verte partout<var 1D /var>! C'est bien compris<var 1D /var>!?

source: TEXT_JOBSCH650_02925_ALKAZOLKA_000_060<tab>Green mucus!? That's not green mucus, it's... <sigh> Never mind.
target: TEXT_JOBSCH650_02925_ALKAZOLKA_000_060<tab>C-comment ça, des traces de bave<var 1D /var>!?

source: TEXT_JOBSCH650_02925_ALKAZOLKA_000_061<tab>No, it's not contagious. You should be fine. Thank you for your help, sir. It is greatly appreciated.
target: TEXT_JOBSCH650_02925_ALKAZOLKA_000_061<tab>Enfin, c'est gentil de votre part. Mes re<var 16 /var>mer<var 16 /var>cie<var 16 /var>ments les plus sincères. Vos manières sont frustes, mais vous avez néanmoins un bon fond<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_JOBSCH650_02925_ALKAZOLKA_000_062<tab>At least for now, we can rest easy knowing that Setoto is safe─or as safe as she can be given the circumstances.
target: TEXT_JOBSCH650_02925_ALKAZOLKA_000_062<tab>Pfiou... Me voilà déjà un peu rassuré.

source: TEXT_JOBSCH650_02925_LANDENEL_000_063<tab>All should be in order. I've seen to it that your friend has been given a comfortable bed to rest in until she recovers.
target: TEXT_JOBSCH650_02925_LANDENEL_000_063<tab>J'ai couché la petite. Rassurez-vous. C'est moi, Landenel, lieutenant de la 6e Lance des vigiles sombres qui serai le gardien du sommeil de ses nuits. Par contre, si sa loupiotte crame mon camp, je ne réponds plus de rien. Vous êtes prévenus.

source: TEXT_JOBSCH650_02925_ALKAZOLKA_000_064<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, I shall return to Bronze Lake and inform Surito Carito of all that has happened. Perhaps he will be able to shed light on what is wrong with Setoto.
target: TEXT_JOBSCH650_02925_ALKAZOLKA_000_064<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, je vais prévenir monsieur Surito Carito, il saura peut-être quoi faire.

source: TEXT_JOBSCH650_02925_ALKAZOLKA_000_065<tab>In the meantime, I would ask that you remain near on hand and keep an eye on her. Don't worry. I shouldn't be away too long.
target: TEXT_JOBSCH650_02925_ALKAZOLKA_000_065<tab>À part ça, on ne peut qu'attendre que son état s'améliore. Je te préviendrai s'il y a du nouveau<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_JOBSCH650_02925_ALKAZOLKA_000_070<tab>
target: TEXT_JOBSCH650_02925_ALKAZOLKA_000_070<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_JOBSCH650_02925_LANDENEL_000_080<tab>
target: TEXT_JOBSCH650_02925_LANDENEL_000_080<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）
